level.heading: Tax abatements for new residential developments - Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall promulgate rules to implement §§ 47-859.01 through 47-859.04 within 180 days after [July 7, 2009].

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 18-10, the NOMA Residential Development Tax Abatement Act of 2009, see Mayor's Order 2010-61, April 23, 2010 (57 DCR 3509).
